content: Cambridge's PhD application cycle is slowely closeing with the funding deadline being December 5th. Cambridge CS has various people working on Lean in different areas. We do not suggest specific projects, but invite applications proposing your personal PhD project. https://www.postgraduate.study.cam.ac.uk/courses/directory/cscspdpcs. My research group e.g. hosts @Siddharth Bhat, @Alex Keizer, and @Chris Hughes at the moment. I am happy to comment on applications.
